author: Florian Hehlen
comment: Very useful but not easy to use. should be easier to browse resorts without going into the add resort to fovorites mode. Removing resorts is much harder than it should be.

author: XinJia Po
comment: Nice interface with photos. Most importantly it gives up to date and accurate ski and snow conditions throughout 🇨🇭. Thx

author: Marc Stoudmann
comment: Pas facile d'utilisation

author: Jelena Stojanovic
comment: Sehr gut!

author: Jan Jemioło
comment: Good for checking snow conditions in Switzerland

author: Vladimir Tassev
comment: Great app.

author: Zenios Zeniou
comment: You need to invest more in the quality of the underlying data. Snow conditions are not always that accurate. I'm still giving 5 stars though because I loved the app itself. Keep it up!
The is good. Info provided is not always totally up to date.

author: Robin S
comment: Great Idea with the app, love the navigation and the use cases. But the app doesn't feel like a finished product, my biggest complaint is the Snow Condition status. At the most of the mountains I have registered the snow condition is "Powder" which is bullshit. It hasn't snowed for 2 weeks and the snow is really hard atm.  I expect better Data for a Version 5.X app.  Keep it up though

author: real atom ant
comment: Excellent app. Good job!

author: Joey Zenhäusern
comment: Unbrauchbar, stürzt auf meinem Nexus 5 direkt beim Start ab!
title: Stürzt ab

author: Mark Purcell
comment: Could I ask for some more web cams of the cross country track for the Engadin ski marathon. The swiss world loppet race with many international competitors.
title: Great - especially with recent falls

author: Shannon Altimari
comment: Seems problems of yore have been fixed.

author: Nautilus
comment: Good app but too many ski resorts are missing.

reply.author: MySwitzerland.com
reply.content: Hello. We know that there are some resorts missing, but this is the decision of the resort itself, to not participate with our app. Please send us an email to mobileapps@switzerland.com, which resorts you are missing. Best regards.

title: Too many resorts missing

author: Marek Nerko
comment: It's ok but some ski resorts are missing

author: Patrick Borner
comment: Quick access to the most important information.

author: ravi verma
comment: Perfect
title: Works well

author: Lucas Berger
comment: Viel besser geworden, gratuliere! Wird sich dann diesen Winter zeigen, wie sich die App gegen andere behaupten kann, aber designmässig siehts schon mal schick aus. Weiter so! Endlich (hat ja nun doch lang gedauert...).

reply.author: MySwitzerland.com
reply.content: Für den Winter 2015/2016 wurde eine komplett überarbeitete Version der Snow Report App realisiert. Die neue App bietet eine Vielzahl an interessanten neuen Funktionen, zudem wurde auch die Stabilität der App verbessert. Viel Spass bei der Nutzung der App!

author: Kwnstantinos kwnstantinos
comment: The best resort in the country is missing... Not good. Not good at all.
title: Where is saas fee?

author: A Google User
comment: Crashing (sometimes), clunky, incomplete, bad looking and completely working against the holo recommendation. Searching is sub-par, no filtering is allowed, no search by regions... How has this been approved to go live!?
title: Terrible

author: Andrej Macko
comment: Crashing all the time. Shows sometimes "" instead of nr of open runs. No status info. Werbung inside. Gui bugs like unreadable fonts overlaped with icons. Ugly and full of bugs.
title: A joke??

author: Simon Kennedy
comment: Search function does not work, scroll through list to mark SaaS Fee as a favourite and Saas Grund also gets added. Select Saas Fee from favourites but will only show SaaS Grund report. Could be good but needs work. HTC Sensation XE.
title: Poor

author: Günther Wasser
comment: Can not start it. Crashes all the time on my Nexus 6 with Marshmallow. Maybe it's working on a very old device with Android 4.1 or earlier

reply.author: MySwitzerland.com
reply.content: We have just released the completely rewritten app version 5. Please try again.

author: Brano Petríček
comment: Plus clunky sorting, which gives really odd results
title: Crashes on Android 5.0.1

author: tony palmer
comment: Fix the problems please
title: No good keeps crashing, It was good

author: Riri
comment: ca marche pas. Ca plante. Ca se broute. Aux chiottes. Loin du bal. Nul
title: Du chenis

author: Samuel Schuler
comment: ... does not even lauch anymore. Database was not up to date when it was still usable.
title: Forget it...

author: Fabian W.
comment: Iphone app is much better...:(
title: Why?

author: A Google User
comment: All I can understand is that there are no resorts present. Already re-installed but the problem persists.
title: No resorts present.

author: A Google User
comment: Always "Loading", unreadable maps, no 'sort' function.  Pretty useless. The iPhone version was better but this for Android is rubbish. Deleted.
title: Badly put together

author: A Google User
comment: Seemed to stick on search function then When I filly got to the resport I wanted, it just sits on loading screen.  Removed from phone.
title: not working

author: Philip Postle
comment: Used to work well and used it a lot last season. No updates & now not finding any resorts.
title: Not working anymore

author: A Google User
comment: Love the full info of this app which includes full description of the resort. Would be nice to filter by activity type and difficulty and map like the website
title: Lots of info

author: A Google User
comment: After iSki became crapware this is the best app for skiers. Only missing showing resort/village locations on Google map and shortcut to navigation.
title: Good

author: A Google User
comment: It so easy to get all information about the place you want  to visit, instead of searching and searching and....
title: Very good, everything in one

author: Gill Gledhill
comment: It doesn't load any resorts, just sits there empty of information. I've tried reloading it twice.
title: No info!

author: A Google User
comment: Works well but almost always crashes on startup, 2nd attempt always works. Piste maps are too low resolution.
title: Worth having

author: A Google User
comment: Not exciting. Crashing aswell.
title: Not so good.

author: A Google User
comment: Very convenient app, but crashed quite often on my Sony Xperia.
title: Great idea

author: A Google User
comment: Easy to use with loads of info for swiss slopes
title: Excellent snow reports for switzerland
